industries.tagline: Get to know more about the companies I've worked for

textContent.name: Forvis Mazars:
textContent.text: Mazars, now merged with Forvis, is a leading international audit, tax, and advisory firm delivering integrated solutions to help businesses navigate complex global markets.

textContent.name: GIZ:
textContent.text: The Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) is a global organization committed to sustainable development, focusing on biodiversity conservation, climate change, and fostering resilient communities worldwide.

textContent.name: The Estée Lauder Companies:
textContent.text: It is a global leader in prestige beauty, home to iconic brands such as Estée Lauder, MAC, and Clinique, offering innovative products across skincare, makeup, and fragrance.

textContent.name: INTEC:
textContent.text: The Instituto Tecnológico de Santo Domingo (INTEC) is one of the leading universities in the Dominican Republic, renowned for its excellence in engineering, medicine, and business education.

textContent.name: Euronext:
textContent.text: It is the largest pan-European stock exchange, facilitating capital market access and driving innovation and growth in financial services across multiple markets.
